body: Damn author nobody had wish to see Aki get laid by all those random students, especially by that ugly fat guy with mind control power. Fuck him, the author put himself in. Just had Takeda Hiromitsu make his own maken ki hentai version. It is his story so he should make it. So that Takeru could fucked all his harem girls.
So this is the lead-up to that English-translated NTR? Why am I not surprised.
